title: Toxic player needs to be banned
body: Ive seen some other posts about this and today I ran into it myself. [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] told me to kill myself among other things and continued to be toxic all game. as ive found out saying kys is apart of your no tolerance rule or something like that. at the after game chat he then proceeded to type racial slurs towards me, which I of course didn't appreciate. Please be a bit more strict riot.

Yikes, misplaced faith, old friend.
